snippet: When choosing a place to live, retirees should consider whether a community reflects their values, and if it can meet their social and health care needs.
abstract: Retirees should consider a host of factors when planning on where to spend the last few decades of their lives; shopping for a retirement community, beyond reading through real estate circulars, tax rates and average temperatures, should also include deciding if health needs will be met, and if area reflects personal values.
lead_paragraph: When choosing a place to live, retirees should consider whether a community reflects their values, and if it can meet their social and health care needs.

headline.main: Finding a Retirement Haven to Suit You
headline.print_headline: Finding a Retirement Haven to Suit You
